name: ころがーる（たま）
summary:
Cute girl rolling on your screen.
★You can choose the color of the background from eight colors.
★When you touch the girl, it becomes to reverse.
★It corresponds to a transverse home screen.
Setting: Home-> Press menu-> wallpapers-> Live Wallpapers
info:
• 中文名: Rolling girl LWP(tama)
  • 平台: Android
  • 开发者: inline planning
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2011-04-07
  • 售价: JP¥299
  • 官方网站: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.inline.rollinggirl.livepapertama
